allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add client-adaptive /dr-learn skill and profile system

- Add /dr-learn skill for discovering client table structures
- Update /dr-extract to use client profiles instead of hardcoded values
- Add config/client-profiles/ for storing client-specific knowledge
- Add profile-schema.json for validation
- Update extraction script to accept --profile and --env flags
- Document git commit guidelines \(general vs client-specific data\)
- Add client knowledge base concept for storing discovered insights

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add aggregation API support and openpyxl dependency

- Add aggregate_table_data MCP tool for no-limit aggregations
- Add aggregate method to DatarailsClient
- Add openpyxl dependency for Excel generation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
